openDataSession

public net.sf.jgcs.DataSession openDataSession(net.sf.jgcs.GroupConfiguration group)
                                        throws net.sf.jgcs.JGCSException
Opens a new Appia DataSession, using the given template. If the session already exists, returns the previously created session. Creates a new Appia instance without opening any channel.

Parameters:
group - the group configuration with the given template.
Throws:
net.sf.jgcs.JGCSException
